active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between strict query depth limiting (e.g., max depth 5) and flexible cost analysis in preventing DoS attacks. Consider developer productivity, user experience, and security in a SaaS environment. Cite OWASP GraphQL Cheat Sheet examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
